advancements.husbandry.coal_cake.title: It's Burnt!
advancements.husbandry.coal_cake.descrip: You burnt a cake and now it's turned into coal
advancements.husbandry.netherite_cake.de: Use a Netherite ingot to craft a cake and then very seriously reevaluate your life choices
advancements.husbandry.diamond_cake.desc: Use a Diamond to craft a cake, it's so shiny
advancements.husbandry.gold_cake.title: It's not Butter?
advancements.husbandry.gold_cake.descrip: This golden cake contains no butter
